COOKIE_SECRET.description: A secret string for securing session cookies

KUKSA_API_ENDPOINT.description: The url at which the kuksa api lives

KUKSA_API_EVENTID.description: The event id of your event in kuksa

KUKSA_API_USERNAME.description: The username of the kuksa api

KUKSA_API_PASSWORD.description: The password to the kuksa api

ENABLE_OFFLINE_LOGIN.description: Set this to true if you need to enable logging in without partioid

PARTIOID_USE_PRODUCTION.description: Set this to true to enable main partioid. Otherwise the partioid test environment will be used

REKI_BASE_URL.description: Set this to the url that people will be accessing your Reki instance. Should not contain a trailing slash

PGSSLMODE.description: Instructs that the connection to the database should be secure
